Html:
Hi

Once you have set up a project using the netoffice developer toolbox, written the code in visual studio express 2010, how then do you build the solution and say bring it into Word 2007 for example.

Thanks

1. Clear checkbox "Register for COM interop" (if you didn't run Visual Studio as administrator)
  2. Choose Build command from Solution Explorer or Build menu.
  3. Register your assembly with regasm utility (if you didn't run Visual Studio as administrator)
Thanks for that. So for testing purposes you really want to run visual studio as the administrator so you don't have to keep registering your assembly. Thus you don't keep loading up the registry.
